summary: A badass alternative colour scheme to the boring leather and bone colours
descriptionHtml:
When I first saw the dragon armours I have to admit, it didn\'t look as threatening as I had anticipated. All that hard work smithing! For what! So I could look like a dry bone thats been left in the sun for too long? THIS WILL NOT SUFFICE!

This Re-texture changes the pale bone colour to a more hardcore dark grey and changes the same old \"leather colour\" to more of a deep maroon.

This is my first retexture so please! Dont hesitate to let me know if there are any little glitches this might create! I have used it for well over an hour and so far all good!

I will be creating an alternative for the dragon scale armour as well so not to worry!
Please endorse ;D
author: Lazersights6
